text:
Ingredients: egg, onion
Recipe: Quick Onion Omelette
1. Beat 2 eggs. 2. Chop onion. 3. Sauté onion, add eggs, cook until set.

Ingredients: egg, tomato, onion
Recipe: Tomato Scrambled Eggs
1. Chop tomato and onion. 2. Cook onion and tomato, add eggs, scramble.

Ingredients: rice, tomato, onion
Recipe: Tomato Fried Rice
1. Cook rice. 2. Sauté onion and tomato. 3. Add rice, mix, serve hot.

Ingredients: potato, onion, green chili
Recipe: Spicy Potato Stir Fry
1. Boil potatoes. 2. Sauté onion and chili. 3. Add potatoes, fry until crisp.

Ingredients: pasta, tomato, garlic
Recipe: Garlic Tomato Pasta
1. Cook pasta. 2. Sauté garlic, add tomato, simmer. 3. Toss pasta with sauce.
